form.heading: Upload a configuration spreadsheet
form.wrong-extension-error: You should choose a spreadsheet file (xlsx/ods).

about.project-description: The Student Course Allocation System is designed to efficiently allocate students to courses based on their preferences and priorities. It supports both a basic allocation algorithm and a more complex genetic algorithm to optimize the distribution of students across available courses.

description.name: Elective Name
description.p1: This course aims to provide students with an introduction to the essential principles of contemporary front-end web development, alongside a brief overview of its historical evolution and technological advancements. Drawing from established industry standards, this course equips students with the requisite skills to pursue professional opportunities. Emphasizing breadth over depth, the course covers a diverse range of topics, rather than concentrating on a singular area of focus such as JavaScript.
description.p2: Throughout this course, students will acquire the ability to develop their own personal website through a series of assignments. Furthermore, they will undertake a course project that combines all of the technologies and best practices studied during the program.
description.know: Knowledge in any general-purpose programming language (Java, C++, Python, …)
